name: Anil

services.title: Art Direction
services.description: We help with the creation and development of online advertising ideas, with particular focus on their visual appearance.

services.title: Branding
services.description: We design key brand elements such as the logo, color scheme, typography, and other design components that makes your brand stand out from competitors.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: We build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

services.title: 3D Design
services.description: We combine creative design and technical skills to build striking 3D visualisations that bring your project to life.

aboutpara: I am a full stack developer with a deep passion for building scalable, user-friendly web applications. I specialize in both front-end and back-end development and have honed my skills in programming languages like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and SQL over the years. In my professional career, I have worked with clients from various industries, ranging from small startups to large corporations, to create innovative digital solutions. My approach to web development is simple - I strive to deliver high-performance solutions that delight end-users. Apart from coding, I am constantly learning and experimenting with new technologies to expand my skill set. I enjoy reading tech blogs, attending webinars, and online courses to keep myself updated with the latest industry trends. I believe that this constant upskilling is essential to stay relevant in the fast-paced tech industry. My work ethic is based on strong collaboration and communication with all stakeholders involved in a project. This includes being open to feedback, offering my own insights, and working closely with team members to deliver high-quality solutions within agreed timelines. In my free time, I enjoy engaging in physical activities, exploring new technologies and software tools, and attending tech events. I believe that being passionate and curious about technology is the key to staying ahead in a constantly evolving industry.
skills: HTML / CSS / JS / React / Next.js / Node.js / Express.js / Tailwind CSS / MUI / TypeScript / Figma / Adobe XD
